prompt.description: Generate a new address by providing a prompt. Select the LLM model and reasoning effort to customize the result.

models.label: Models
models.description: Larger models are more capable but may be slower.

effort.label: Reasoning Effort
effort.description: Higher effort means thoughtful answers but slower.

basicInfo.description: Provide the basic information of the person. These fields are important for indexing and searching in the database.

briefIntro.label: Brief Introduction
briefIntro.placeholder: A Russian playwright and short-story writer.

address.description: Provide the person's address. It doesn't necessary to be an very accurate address but should at least reflect the era and the region the person living/lived in.

errors.tagsField: Please provide at least one tag
errors.briefIntroField: The brief introduction should have at least 5 words

json.title: Parse address from JSON
json.description: Paste a JSON object containing address data. The form fields will be automatically populated with the parsed values.
